p: HA titrations were conducted in 96-well microplates using turkey red blood cells (RBC) following the standard technique [28]. Virus infectious titers were measured using the 50% tissue culture infectious doses (TCID 50) assay based on cytopathic effect (CPE) and the plaque assay based on plaque forming unit (PFU) in Vero cells [15], [28]. A positive control with pre-specified acceptable range was included for conducting HA, TCID 50, and plaque assays.
